front.title: An one-to-any Assured Rate Per-Domain Behavior for Differentiated Services

abstract.t: This document defines a Per-Domain Behavior (PDB) called one-to-anyAssured Rate. The PDB is useful to implement services in aDifferentiate Services domain, which need an assured rate. Theassurance is given with a certain well-defined probability fortraffic using this PDB. However, no delay and no jitter guaranteesare provided.
